title: The Night They Took Miss Beautiful

sources.title: The Night They Took Miss Beautiful
sources.description: Criminals hijack an airplane that not only carries a dangerous organism that is to be used in bacterial warfare, but also five beauty contest finalists.

sources.title: The Night They Took Miss Beautiful (1977)
sources.description: Criminals hijack an airplane carrying five beauty contest finalists, but unknowingly they've also kidnapped a government agent carrying a dangerous virus that is to be used in bacterial warfare. metadata.Plot: Criminals hijack an airplane that not only carries a dangerous organism that is to be used in bacterial warfare, but also five beauty contest finalists.
